turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello! how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order an espresso from Starbucks on Old Seward and Diamond in Anchorage, Alaska.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hmmm. i can't hear you. could you please speak into your mic.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. I would like to order an espresso from Starbucks in Anchorage, Alaska, on the corner of Old Seward and Diamond Boulevard.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: that's better. awesome. what drink do u want to order from starbucks.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: an espresso.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What size do they have?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: they have tall, grande and venti.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did u want anything in your espresso? like milk or sugar.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What type of milk does Starbucks have Starbucks have?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What type of milk does Starbucks have?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: starbucks has Whole, Nonfat, 2%, Soy, Coconut, Almond.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like coconut milk, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great. do you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Please add whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so you said you want a venti espresso with coconut milk and whipped cream from starbucks in anchorage alaska.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $3.00 is your total. should i place the order for you now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. And then confirm it for me, please.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, and then confirm it, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i heard you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, the order will be ready for pick up in 10 minutes. you ordered a venti espresso with coconut milk from starbucks in anchorage alaska and the total cost was $3.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Goodbye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the receipt will be sent to your mobile device shortly.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: have a great day my friend.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You, too.
